changelog: Add new character '-' into custom page on watermark and split (ex: 1,2,3-5)
Fix issue wrong downloaded file on split PDF
Update our 3rd party library PDF.JS into 4.4.168
Fix issue connection timeout in some case
Fix issue error message are not show properly
Updating our internal libraries to latest version
Fix issue 'Internal Server Error(0)' when upload file in several menu
Fix issue missing thumbnail when upload PPT or PPTX file on Convert To PDF menu
Fix issue on Split PDF that total PDF pages are not counted properly
Properly describe actually message on upload file, instead only show 'Internal Server Error'
Updating our internal libraries to latest version
After task completed, it will show success notification and scroll automatically to download layout
Along task processed, almost all component will have pulse animation
HtmlToPDF and Watermark PDF menu got slightly polish on menu selection
Loading notification for task process, now are not lock the screen entirely (Click outside notification to unlock)
Introducing features to check if user was accessed Hana PDF from latest revision or using cached revision
Introducing features to see recent updates from Hana PDF (What's New)
Optimize our web resources to maintain speed and efficiency for when loading page
Change footer location back to left from center
Introducing more advanced features for HTML to PDF convert
Upgrade our web framework to latest Laravel 11.x
